Content-transfer-encoding: 7BIT

: : Diesel : :

He smiled at his friends excitment.

Diesel: Alright lets go get our ship. And maybe, just maybe, we get to kill some bots doing it!

Diesel transformes to his fuel truck mode.

Diesel: Roll out!

He drives out and pulls to the side waiting for Arrow to lead the way.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Iron Man Lives Again! 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 2:07 PM
  Subject: Re: Secret Messages


  Arrow: Right. Let's go and steal one, then?

  Arrow runs from the building.

  Deemos: After you.

  Arrow walks back in.

  Arrow: Sorry, got over anxious...

    ----- Original Message -----
    From: RoboRick007
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
    Sent: Monday, August 12, 2002 3:13 PM
    Subject: Re: Secret Messages


    : : Diesel : :

    Diesel nods, greeting Deemos. But he quickly turns to buisness.

    Diesel: We should leave quickly. If the Maximal government decodes the message they will be on us in a nano click. The Tripredacus Council probably wont be happy either. We should pack some equipment and get the ship within the next few hours.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Iron Man Lives Again! 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Monday, August 12, 2002 2:48 AM
      Subject: Re: Secret Messages


      Arrow: Yeah. I know where we can "get" a ship.

      Shortly thereafter, Deemos pushed the doors open with a loud thud. He walks in slowly and walked right up to Arrow's face.

      Deemos: Remember we made a truce last time we met.

      Arrow: Yeah. You killed Perplex anyway.

      Deemos smiled.

      Deemos: It was a very good old friend of mine who killed Perplex.

      Arrow: I killed the kid.

      Deemos: Oh?

      Arrow: The male. Ripped the spark out of his chest.

      Deemos: I underestimated you, then.

      Arrow: This is Diesel.

      Deemos: Greetings.

      Arrow: Diesel, this is the Deemos. The leader of the former group the Chosen Mafia.

      Deemos smiled with the intentions of a demon dreaming, or something like that...

        ----- Original Message -----
        From: RoboRick007
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
        Sent: Monday, August 12, 2002 2:35 AM
        Subject: Re: Secret Messages


        : : Diesel : :

        Diesel looks shocked when Deemos' voice comes through the comm.

        Diesel: It did... it worked. I guess now we just wait for him. Then it's off too Earth!
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: Iron Man Lives Again! 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Monday, August 12, 2002 1:59 AM
          Subject: Re: Secret Messages


          Arrow: I don't think that'll work, it could be a very old listing.

          (Meanwhile)

          Deemos (thinking): If someone wants to contact me, they'd probably look up my old number.

          He types his old number into his commlink and waits.

          (Meanwhile)

          Arrow dials the number.

          Deemos over comm unit: Hello. No time to waste, location.

          Arrow reads off the address of the place. Since that it was so secret, I won't tell it here. (I don't know it)

          Arrow: It worked...

            ----- Original Message -----
            From: RoboRick007
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
            Sent: Monday, August 12, 2002 1:28 AM
            Subject: Re: Secret Messages


            : : Diesel : :

            Diesel tries to think of a way to reach Deemos. He finally comes up with something, but a long shot.

            Diesel: Well I wouldn't know. We can try the listings for his comm channel. A bot like him probably isn't listed, but it's all I can think to do.

            Diesel sits at a computer and starts to search through records. After about ten minutes he comes up with it. He stands back from the comp.

            Diesel: Well I'll be a Sharkticon, here it is. Try this channel.

            He points to the list on the screen.
              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: Iron Man Lives Again! 
              To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent: Monday, August 12, 2002 1:14 AM
              Subject: Re: Secret Messages


              Arrow: The message sent asked for another person. whom I recognize. His name is Deemos, and he used to be both an ally and an enemy of mine at different times. He's deadly, but so are we.

              He crosses his arms.

              Arrow: I used to know alot of others, but I broke off from them a bit back. The one named Airbomber got very jealous of me. He was only greedy and an egomaniac, however. Where could we find Deemos? I've long since forgotten his signal...

                ----- Original Message -----
                From: RoboRick007
                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                Sent: Monday, August 12, 2002 12:56 AM
                Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                : : Diesel : :

                He looked at Arrow. He eyes flashed and gave a very evil sense. You knew that he had a maniacle smile under his faceplate.

                Diesel: You know it. However we should take care of some things here first. If we go to join Razor, we may need more men. Know of anyone?
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: Degenerate 
                  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                  Sent: Monday, August 12, 2002 12:39 AM
                  Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                  OOC: If I can be serious for a minute, this group is the epitome of seriousness and does not deserve to be subjected to a silly post. Prepare for the rebirth of the original rookie monster of NBW.

                  BIC:

                  Arrow hears Diesel's voice. His back was turned to his old ally. He tries to remember where he had seen Diesel before. Memories of his past come flying back to him. They return easily when he needs them enough, he finds, the Radicons hadn't done a very good job of erasing these memories. He slowly turns around, recalling Diesel's place in his tumultuous life.

                  Arrow: Ah, yes, Diesel, the message. It has been a long time, hasn't it? Shall we get to business immediately?

                  Arrow could barely remember Razor. He didn't hold anything against the Radicons for damaging his memory so badly. They did what they had to, Arrow had attempted to kill them.

                  Arrow: So, what now? Do we head to Earth?
                  ~~~~~
                  Deemos was sitting in a meeting, bored.

                  Leader: Gentlemen, we must all band together and stop this menace! We cannot allow this other club to gain the upper hand! We truly have the best flag! The others will pay for their disagreeance!

                  Deemos: What kind of club is this? And is disagreeance a word?

                  Leader: This is not a club, this is a council. It's the Council of Evil. And yes, Disagreeance is a word.

                  Deemos: No, you said "We cannot allow this other club to gain the upper hand," apparently if there is this "other" club, this is a club.

                  Leader: See here--

                  Deemos: I was the one who held a council. We were the Mafia, the most imposing group to ever exist save for the Alliance.

                  Leader: Sir, I'm certain I don't know what you are talking about.

                  Deemos: If this so called council is so evil, why is it that we are not attacking, and why is it that we are not spilling blood.

                  Leader: Mech fluid.

                  Deemos: It's the same thing. I've spilled alot of it.

                  Leader: Well, sir, you see, we like to bide our time, and then--

                  Deemos: Then you burn someone else's flag. Then they come and burn yours. You don't know what violence is. I am the epitome of violence. The innovator. The only individuals I've seen you destroy are your own comrades. Not that it's a bad thing to destroy your comrades, I've destroyed plenty of lackeys in my time.

                  Leader: I think you're only saying this because you've joined another council! I think you need to be dealt with! You're nothing more than a vicious traitor!

                  Deemos: So you guys are going to deal with me? Put me away? Send me to the great junkyard in the sky?

                  Member: Junkyard?

                  Leader: Enough of this, get him!

                  Deemos stands up. A member sitting right next to him stands up as well, but he's too slow and too dumb. Deemos puts a pistol to his mid section quickly and fires. Several bolts rip through the robot, creating several flashes and one hole leading all the way through. The unlucky one falls to the ground. Deemos' trigger finger quickly flicks a switch on the utility pistol as he swivels it around towards another member who was raising a rifle. Deemos moves forward a single step and barely dodges a shot heading his way. He fires the pistol and a barrage of 5 inch long steel nails are fired at rapid speed, piercing the head of the attackee and tearing off large chunks. Deemos quickly spins around, flicking a switch once more and he fires. Several shots hit the robot who had fired at him, cutting down the bot who shocked at Deemos' speed and severing one of his arms and his head. The cut down fellow's head rolled across the floor as the body dropped.

                  Leader: Idiots!

                  Deemos quickly fired a few pellets on the ground, which erupted into tall flames. He was hidden from sight. A shot emerges from behind the flames, passing Deemos' head by inches.

                  Leader: Did you hear that? I think I got him.

                  A grenade flies out from behind the fire and rolls near the Leader of the council's feet.

                  (Cut to)

                  Deemos runs through the halls of the building as a massive explosion erupts behind him, detonating the room he previously occupied. It was no problem escaping from these buffoons, he thought as he exited the building, laughing at the fact that he destroyed about 20 or so more lives. He decided to check his messages. His commlink system was designed to capture messages and hold them for a later hearing. He had two of these. He activated the first one.

                  Message: Hey, buddy, I got some of those (buzz) were trying to get. It was (buzz) so, you wanna (buzz) we've--

                  Deemos deletes the message quickly. A wrong number and a bad commlink. He activates the next message. He listens to the code carefully then plays it back again. He plays it back a third time.

                  Deemos: Hmm. Maybe. This sounds like the old code.

                  He activates his jets and flies, planning to answer this message addressing him and the the one that he knew well back on Earth, Arrow. It had been a long time since he had come in contact with Razor. He was ready for anything...

                    ----- Original Message -----
                    From: RoboRick007
                    To: Neo Beast Wars
                    Sent: Sunday, August 11, 2002 11:03 PM
                    Subject: Secret Messages


                    : : Diesel : :

                    On Cybertron a fuel tanker truck drives down an elevated street, before pulling into what looked like an abandon building. The black and silver truck transformes into a menacing Cybertronian. A Decepticon too be exact. He turns to the others in the building.

                    Diesel: Hey Arrow, did you pick up that incoded transmission that came through the Transwarp portal?

                    He awaits a response.

                    : : Wolfenstein : :

                    While he follows Megatron deeper into the base. His comm system picks up a transmission. However it is heavily incoded so he cannot listen too it now. He sets his comm unit to work on it, and continues on.


                  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service. 



                Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service. 



              Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service. 



            Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service. 



          Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service. 



        Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.

              ADVERTISEMENT

--Boundary_(ID_1S9U7ibXo8ZPWTVY1D4kFQ)

            Messages</DIV>
            <DIV><BR></DIV>
            <DIV align=center><STRONG><FONT face=Arial size=2>: : Diesel : 
            :</FONT></STRONG></DIV>
            <DIV align=center><STRONG><FONT face=Arial 
            size=2></FONT></STRONG> </DIV>
            <DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2>Diesel tries to think of a 
            way to reach Deemos. He finally comes up with something, but a long 
            shot.</FONT></DIV>
            <DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2></FONT> </DIV>
            <DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2><STRONG>Diesel: 
            </STRONG>Well I wouldn't know. We can try the listings for his comm 
            channel. A bot like him probably isn't listed, but it's all I can 
            think to do.</FONT></DIV>
            <DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2></FONT> </DIV>
            <DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2>Diesel sits at a computer 
            and starts to search through records. After about ten minutes he 
            comes up with it. He stands back from the comp.</FONT></DIV>
            <DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2></FONT> </DIV>
            <DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2><STRONG>Diesel: 
            </STRONG>Well I'll be a Sharkticon, here it is. Try this 
            channel.</FONT></DIV>
            <DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2></FONT> </DIV>
            <DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2>He points to the list on 
            the screen.</FONT></DIV>
            <BLOCKQUOTE 
            style="PADDING-RIGHT: 0px; PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #000000 2px solid; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0px">
              <DIV style="FONT: 10pt arial">----- Original Message ----- </DIV>
              <DIV 
              style="BACKGROUND: #e4e4e4; FONT: 10pt arial; font-color: black"><B>From:</B> 
              <A title=thecode@... 
              href="mailto:thecode@...">Iron Man Lives Again!</A> </DIV>
              <DIV style="FONT: 10pt arial"><B>To:</B> <A 
              title=nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
              href="mailto:nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com">nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com</A> 
              </DIV>
              <DIV style="FONT: 10pt arial"><B>Sent:</B> Monday, August 12, 2002 
              1:14 AM</DIV>
              <DIV style="FONT: 10pt arial"><B>Subject:</B> Re: Secret 
              Messages</DIV>
              <DIV><BR></DIV>
              <DIV><FONT size=2>Arrow: The message sent asked for another 
              person. whom I recognize. His name is Deemos, and he used to be 
              both an ally and an enemy of mine at different times. He's deadly, 
              but so are we.</FONT></DIV>
              <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
              <DIV><FONT size=2>He crosses his arms.</FONT></DIV>
              <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
              <DIV><FONT size=2>Arrow: I used to know alot of others, but I 
              broke off from them a bit back. The one named Airbomber got very 
              jealous of me. He was only greedy and an egomaniac, however. Where 
              could we find Deemos? I've long since forgotten his 
              signal...</FONT></DIV>
              <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
              <BLOCKQUOTE 
              style="PADDING-RIGHT: 0px; PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #000000 2px solid; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0px">
                <DIV style="FONT: 10pt arial">----- Original Message -----</DIV>
                <DIV 
                style="BACKGROUND: #e4e4e4; FONT: 10pt arial; font-color: black"><B>From:</B> 
                <A title=rfa007@... 
                href="mailto:rfa007@...">RoboRick007</A></DIV>
                <DIV style="FONT: 10pt arial"><B>To:</B> <A 
                title=nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                href="mailto:nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com">nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com</A></DIV>
                <DIV style="FONT: 10pt arial"><B>Sent:</B> Monday, August 12, 
                2002 12:56 AM</DIV>
                <DIV style="FONT: 10pt arial"><B>Subject:</B> Re: Secret 
                Messages</DIV>
                <DIV><BR></DIV>
                <DIV align=center><STRONG><FONT face=Arial size=2>: : Diesel : 
                :</FONT></STRONG></DIV>
                <DIV align=center><STRONG><FONT face=Arial 
                size=2></FONT></STRONG> </DIV>
                <DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2>He looked at Arrow. He 
                eyes flashed and gave a very evil sense. You knew that he had a 
                maniacle smile under his faceplate.</FONT></DIV>
                <DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                <DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2><STRONG>Diesel: 
                </STRONG>You know it. However we should take care of some things 
                here first. If we go to join Razor, we may need more men. Know 
                of anyone?</FONT></DIV>
                <BLOCKQUOTE 
                style="PADDING-RIGHT: 0px; PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #000000 2px solid; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0px">
                  <DIV style="FONT: 10pt arial">----- Original Message ----- 
                  </DIV>
                  <DIV 
                  style="BACKGROUND: #e4e4e4; FONT: 10pt arial; font-color: black"><B>From:</B> 
                  <A title=thecode@... 
                  href="mailto:thecode@...">Degenerate</A> </DIV>
                  <DIV style="FONT: 10pt arial"><B>To:</B> <A 
                  title=nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                  href="mailto:nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com">nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com</A> 
                  </DIV>
                  <DIV style="FONT: 10pt arial"><B>Sent:</B> Monday, August 12, 
                  2002 12:39 AM</DIV>
                  <DIV style="FONT: 10pt arial"><B>Subject:</B> Re: Secret 
                  Messages</DIV>
                  <DIV><BR></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>OOC: If I can be serious for a minute, this 
                  group is the epitome of seriousness and does not deserve to be 
                  subjected to a silly post. Prepare for the rebirth of the 
                  original rookie monster of NBW.</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>BIC:</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Arrow hears Diesel's voice. His back was 
                  turned to his old ally. He tries to remember where he had seen 
                  Diesel before. Memories of his past come flying back to him. 
                  They return easily when he needs them enough, he finds, the 
                  Radicons hadn't done a very good job of erasing these 
                  memories. He slowly turns around, recalling Diesel's place in 
                  his tumultuous life.</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Arrow: Ah, yes, Diesel, the message. It has 
                  been a long time, hasn't it? Shall we get to business 
                  immediately?</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Arrow could barely remember Razor. He didn't 
                  hold anything against the Radicons for damaging his memory so 
                  badly. They did what they had to, Arrow had attempted to kill 
                  them.</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Arrow: So, what now? Do we head to 
                  Earth?</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>~~~~~</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Deemos was sitting in a meeting, 
                  bored.</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Leader: Gentlemen, we must all band together 
                  and stop this menace! We cannot allow this other club to gain 
                  the upper hand! We truly have the best flag! The others will 
                  pay for their disagreeance!</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Deemos: What kind of club is this? And is 
                  disagreeance a word?</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Leader: This is not a club, this is a 
                  council. It's the Council of Evil. And yes, Disagreeance is a 
                  word.</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Deemos: No, you said "We cannot allow this 
                  other club to gain the upper hand," apparently if there is 
                  this "other" club, this is a club.</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Leader: See here--</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Deemos: I was the one who held a council. We 
                  were the Mafia, the most imposing group to ever exist save for 
                  the Alliance.</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Leader: Sir, I'm certain I don't know what 
                  you are talking about.</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Deemos: If this so called council is so 
                  evil, why is it that we are not attacking, and why is it that 
                  we are not spilling blood.</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Leader: Mech fluid.</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Deemos: It's the same thing. I've spilled 
                  alot of it.</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Leader: Well, sir, you see, we like to bide 
                  our time, and then--</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Deemos: Then you burn someone else's flag. 
                  Then they come and burn yours. You don't know what violence 
                  is. I am the epitome of violence. The innovator. The only 
                  individuals I've seen you destroy are your own comrades. Not 
                  that it's a bad thing to destroy your comrades, I've destroyed 
                  plenty of lackeys in my time.</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Leader: I think you're only saying this 
                  because you've joined another council! I think you need to be 
                  dealt with! You're nothing more than a vicious 
                  traitor!</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Deemos: So you guys are going to deal with 
                  me? Put me away? Send me to the great junkyard in the 
                  sky?</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Member: Junkyard?</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Leader: Enough of this, get 
him!</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Deemos stands up. A member sitting right 
                  next to him stands up as well, but he's too slow and too dumb. 
                  Deemos puts a pistol to his mid section quickly and fires. 
                  Several bolts rip through the robot, creating several flashes 
                  and one hole leading all the way through. The unlucky one 
                  falls to the ground. Deemos' trigger finger quickly flicks a 
                  switch on the utility pistol as he swivels it around towards 
                  another member who was raising a rifle. Deemos moves forward a 
                  single step and barely dodges a shot heading his way. He fires 
                  the pistol and a barrage of 5 inch long steel nails are fired 
                  at rapid speed, piercing the head of the attackee and tearing 
                  off large chunks. Deemos quickly spins around, flicking a 
                  switch once more and he fires. Several shots hit the robot who 
                  had fired at him, cutting down the bot who shocked at Deemos' 
                  speed and severing one of his arms and his head. The cut down 
                  fellow's head rolled across the floor as the body 
                  dropped.</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Leader: Idiots!</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Deemos quickly fired a few pellets on the 
                  ground, which erupted into tall flames. He was hidden from 
                  sight. A shot emerges from behind the flames, passing Deemos' 
                  head by inches.</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Leader: Did you hear that? I think I got 
                  him.</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>A grenade flies out from behind the fire and 
                  rolls near the Leader of the council's feet.</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>(Cut to)</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Deemos runs through the halls of the 
                  building as a massive explosion erupts behind him, detonating 
                  the room he previously occupied. It was no problem escaping 
                  from these buffoons, he thought as he exited the 
                  building, laughing at the fact that he destroyed about 20 or 
                  so more lives. He decided to check his messages. His commlink 
                  system was designed to capture messages and hold them for a 
                  later hearing. He had two of these. He activated the first 
                  one.</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Message: Hey, buddy, I got some of those 
                  (buzz) were trying to get. It was (buzz) so, you wanna (buzz) 
                  we've--</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Deemos deletes the message quickly. A wrong 
                  number and a bad commlink. He activates the next message. He 
                  listens to the code carefully then plays it back again. He 
                  plays it back a third time.</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>Deemos: Hmm. Maybe. This sounds like the old 
                  code.</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2>He activates his jets and flies, planning to 
                  answer this message addressing him and the the one that he 
                  knew well back on Earth, Arrow. It had been a long time since 
                  he had come in contact with Razor. He was ready for 
                  anything...</FONT></DIV>
                  <DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>

                    <DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2>On Cybertron a

                    <DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial

                    <DIV align=center><STRONG><FONT face=Arial 
                    size=2></FONT></STRONG> </DIV>
                    <DIV align=center><FONT face=Arial size=2>While he follows 
                    Megatron deeper into the base. His comm system picks up a
